attributes.action: ensure that Terry Wogan does at least one more Eurovision
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Disheartened with the way the Eastern European countries are block voting, last night, towards the end of Eurovision 2008, Sir Terry Wogan said that he had to decide if he was coming back next year. This petition has been set up to show him how much we love him - and that Eurovision needs him. Don't go Sir Terry! 

Or at least if you are going, give us one more year so we can send you off in style.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
